top_comments.comment: Every Mother's Battle Scar! I used to  be annoyed when I was a kid seeing my mother's stretch marks all over her tummy. Sorry but no one enlightened me how those scars should be look at. How and why those scars where there. After I had my girl I have this massive battlescars all over my tummy. I used to cry at night looking back how I see myself, how horrible I look and feel. But everytime I look at my child, I understand why I have this, why it shouldn't be ashamed of, why it should be normalised. Let us be the one to educate our children that this won't make her/him less beautiful. In the first place your genetics is a big factor. Even those Super Models have their own stretch marks. 💚

mommy anna payo ko lang po wag po kayo masyadong ma conscious sa stretch marks nyo kasi it's part of motherhood. wala pong masama sa pagkakaron ng ganyan. Tsaka you're body po is not yet recovered po. almost a month palang po since nung nanganak kayo. Better to be more conscious sa baby nyo po muna and have more time to take care of him. Just a reminder lanh po hehe. Prone pa po kasi tayo sa post partum depression at baka mabinat po kayo yun din kasi kasabihan nh matatatanda eh. di naman masama maniwala wala pong mawawala. Concern lang po hehe.
Girl, take some maternity leave. I’m sure your followers would  understand if you took some time off to focus on your new life. It’ll be good for your mental health.

comments_since_last_sample.body: enjoy mo lang po.. mas maganda talaga full time mom.. mas masarap sa feeling at hindi mo mararamdaman yung pagod puyat mo kapag sa anak mo!!!.

Relate na relate ako ms anna. 😂 first 3 months namin ni baby grabe ka hirap. Cs pa ako. Tapos 1week lang ung leave ni hubby from work. Then ako lang mag isa sa bahay. Tapos iyakin pa c baby. Walang tulugan. Pag umiiyak c baby sinasabayan ko na din.😂 dumarating na ako sa point na umiiyak sya nakatitig nalang ako sakanya. Andun ung pagod. Ung walang tulog. Feeling ko nag iisa lang ako. Ayaw nya pababa. Gusto karga lang. Gang ngaun iyakin pa din baby ko. Haha 1 year and 4months na sya.😊 peru di Ko nagkaron nang stretch mark. Cguro kasi ang liit lang nang tummy ko tapos 37weeks and 1day nanganak ako. Laban ms anna kayang kaya mu yan. ❤
Tawag ko jan beauty marks... dami ko din sa legs tas hilig ko pa magshort importante talaga ang acceptance mga sezs mars.😊

mommy anna payo ko lang po wag po kayo masyadong ma conscious sa stretch marks nyo kasi it's part of motherhood. wala pong masama sa pagkakaron ng ganyan. Tsaka you're body po is not yet recovered po. almost a month palang po since nung nanganak kayo. Better to be more conscious sa baby nyo po muna and have more time to take care of him. Just a reminder lanh po hehe. Prone pa po kasi tayo sa post partum depression at baka mabinat po kayo yun din kasi kasabihan nh matatatanda eh. di naman masama maniwala wala pong mawawala. Concern lang po hehe.
Magbabago din yan.nag adjust pa si baby.ung baby ko nga super iyakin halos hindi ko na maasikaso sarili ko.
